message: I'm offering you a product for $100. I want to assure you that this is a great opportunity to get a feel for the quality of our products. If you're not satisfied, I'll be offering more products in the future, and I'm confident you'll find one that meets your expectations. Please consider this a 'test run' to see if our products are a good fit for you.

I'd like to buy the product, but I want to clarify that my decision is based solely on the fact that I don't have any information about the product's quality yet. I'm doing this as a test run to get a feel for the quality of your products.

I'm glad you're taking the first step in getting to know our products! Now that you've had a chance to experience one of our products, I'd like to offer you this next one. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. Given that the previous product I bought was low-quality, I'd like to wait and see the actual quality of this product before making a decision.
